clinical_history: Patient with chronic dyspnea and smoking history.
findings: Bronchiectatic changes in left lower lobe region.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in left lower lobe.
Pleural effusion on the left lower lobe side, moderate in size.
Small pneumothorax on the left lower lobe side.
Well-defined nodule measuring 46 mm in left lower lobe.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in left lower lobe.
